history.proof: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP. induction os. shelve.

ctx: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Cq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q HinP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q HjnP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q M1_min : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x (zero_mon n) ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x x ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2235 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq)".

ctx: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP.
exceptions.tactic: apply CombLinear_1 with (a := spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Cq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q HinP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q HjnP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q M1_min : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x (zero_mon n) ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x x ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) The term "spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq" has type "list (Term A n)" while it is expected to have type "(A * mon n)%type".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q : list (Term A n)) (Cp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p) (Cq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q -> CombLinear Q (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq)

Premises:

ltP_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p

```  
intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP.
induction os.
- apply CombLinear_0.
- apply CombLinear_1 with (a := spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq).
  + (* Proving ~ zeroP *)
    intros Hzero.
    apply os; assumption.
  + (* Proving inPolySet *)
    apply HinP.
  + (* Proving CombLinear *)
    apply IHos; assumption.
  + (* Proving eqP *)
    apply HinP.
Qed.
```

original: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP. induction os. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (a := spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq). + intros Hzero. apply os; auto. + apply HinP. + apply IHos; auto. + apply HinP.
